Key: (...I wonder how much time has passed.)

(I feel like I've been staring at the ceiling for
ages.)

(I never knew how boring it was not being able to take
a step outside of my bed...)
(How did this happen?)
(Both hands in a cast... This is quite an injury.)

(It's been some time since the accident, but no one
has come to visit me... I'm alone all day, every day.)

(All I can do is sleep, but now that it's the only
thing I do, it no longer comes easily to me.)
(I turned my head slightly to look around me.)
(The scenery of the room doesn't change much.)

(I'm sick of looking at my room. Gosh, I wish someone
would come visit...)
(My sister Kotori might, but...)
Hey, Kotori. Are you there?
(...Well, of course she won't answer.)

(Gosh... it's so quiet... Isn't there anything
to do...?)
(...?! I know! My cell phone!)

(I don't know how well I can use it, but I might be
able to get a hold of someone.)
Oh, um... Is it around here?

(Oh, it's under the pillow. Even with the cast on,
I feel like I can reach it if I try.)

(Just a bit... just a bit more, and I'll be there...
Good luck, me.)
Got it!
(Hm? But this isn't my phone. Uh...)

(Hm. It seems to be a button... a switch for something.
Why is this under the pillow?)
(Should I try... pressing it?)
Press it.
Don't press it.
(All right, I'm going to press it.)
(Yah!)
Hey, heeey. Hello!
Someone's here?! And she came right away!
I'm a new nurse, just passing by～
Just a passerby?!
Please call me Miku, darling.
Why are you calling me, darling?!

You seeee, I belong to a sect that calls all patients
darling.
That has nothing to do with sects!
So what's the matter today, darling?
Can you not keep going as if nothing happened?!

It'll be all right! Don't be afraid～ Let's take your
temperature.
Oh... Um, sure.

...My, you seem to have a fever. It's like... 98
degrees.
That's average!
And you seem to be injured. Does it hurt～?

Huh? How can you not tell a patient's condition?!
Are you really a nurse?!
Why yes, of course. Although just in passing.

I don't feel safe! And you're close! Too close for
comfort!

Okay, okay. No need to panic. I'll take good care of
you.

How are you going to take care of me when you don't
know how I'm doing?

I will! I totally will. I mean, I'm an angel
dressed in white～
That's impossible! Sorry, but can you try again...?!

Hmm. Then perhaps, eating first? I'm sure you can't
eat like that.

You're not even listening to me! But it's nice to know
you have a normal thought process.
Hold on a minute, okay～
What... What was all that about?

She claimed to be a nurse and that everything would
be all right. I couldn't believe a word she said...

And first of all, how did she even show up like that?
It's too mysterious...

Hey, hey. Sorry for the wait, darling～ It's time for
your meal!.

Whoa, so fast?! She came back already?! And she
brought some kind of hospital food?!
The angel Miku is going to feed you, okay?
Hey... Close! Too close!
Here you go, darling. Open wiiiiide.

*Grunt*... It smells so good... I can't endure this on
an empty stomach.

Let's open up a lot more enthusiastically～
Now, say ahhhh...
A-Ahh.... *nom*.
Once it's in your mouth, be sure to chew a lot.
*Nom*... *cough*...
Very good. Now let's eat more～
Oh?

S-So spicyyyyyyyyyy! What the hell is this?! No way
you'd be feeding this to someone who's bedridden.

Oh, dear me... I thought that was salt. I guess I
messed up and put in chili paste... Tee-hee♪

How do you mess that up?! No matter how cute you
are, that's something I can't let slide.
Booo. I'm sorry～ I haven't been a nurse for long.

That has nothing to do with you being new...
*grunt*... *cough*.. anyways, I need water...
Here you go. I only have hot, though.
Hot! It burns. It burns. I—
—BAH! Is this some kind of torture?!
Okaaay. So after water, open wide again～

No... Wait a minute. That's it! Yeah, I'm actually not
that hungry.
Is that so～ That's unfortunate～
(It's unfortunate I can't eat an actual meal...)

During a time like this, I don't want to touch anything
if I don't know what'll happen.
Man... I'm so bored...
Oh well... I guess I have no choice but to sleep.
Hm?
Oh, no...?
I see a woman... I guess I'm starting to see phantoms.
Um. Excuse me, I'm not a phantom.
Hunh...?
Wait... That's really a person....?
Yes, I am～!
When did you... Wait... Who are you?
Oh me? I'm a nurse～

Nurse... Did someone call you over? I had no idea,
but... what a relief... When did...

You poor thing... Your memory must be hazy due to
your injury. I'll take good care of you, so fear not,
okay?
I see. So that's why I didn't notice...
...Hey wait?! What are you doing?!
*Giggle*... I'm taking your pants off～

WHAAAAAAAAAAAAA?! Why?! Why would you do such
a thing?!

Judging from your appearance, it seems like you won't
be able to go to the bathroom by yourself. That's
why～

Yeah, but still! It's embarrassing to do this out of
nowhere!
Okay, okay, no need to be embarrassed～
Oh! Your hand! It's coming inside the blanket!
Ei～☆
...Hahh!
Okay, don't move.
Ahh... ahh... wait, no...
That area... AH!
Okay, I'm going to go all out.
Um... Excuse me, Miss Nurse?
Hm? What's the matter?
Close... Your chest is... um...
How odd? Can't do it at all.
Y-Yes... Um, I'm so nervous it went away....
Oh, is that so? That's unfortunate.
Let's go to the bathroom another day.
...Phew.
So, next...
...What? There's still more?
Tadaaaa. Time for your shots～
Sh-Shots?!
It'll be fine. This won't hurt a bit!
That's not even the issue... Do I need a shot?
Yes, of course. That's what I came here for.
What? Really?
Yup, yup～
Just out of curiosity, what kind of shot is it?
Huh...?

Wait... Why are you going quiet? I mean, there has
to be a reason for it. What kind of shot is this for?
Uh... I'm a new nurse.

NO! That's something you SHOULD know as a nurse,
new OR old! The bare minimum!
Okaaay. Now, roll up your sleeves～
She ignored me! Noooo, I'm scared! But I can't move!
First, I'm going to disinfect it!
Miss Nurse? Excuse me?! EXCUSE ME?!
Yes～?
What's not an antiseptic. That's a bath bomb!
Oh, my... *giggle*

That's not something to giggle about! Look! It's
foaming up! LOOK!

It'll be fine. It'll be over before you finish counting
the stains on the ceiling.

There aren't any! What is this, some kind of old
school love hotel?!
And let's move onto the shot—
AHHH! I'm scared! SUPER SCARED!
My! Ooops!
I dropped the needle～
Th-That's so dangerous...
Where did you go...?
(Wait, she left the room.)
Mr. Shot～ Come out, come out, wherever you are～
D-Did you find it?
Mmm. No. I wonder where it went...?
...Maybe the shot got scared and ran for it, too.
Hm? Huh? Huh?
WHOAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

(Why is she dressed like this?! I mean, when did she
change...? That doesn't matter right now.)
Um, I would guess that it's under the desk...
What? This way?
Not that way. A bit closer...
Whaaat? Then this～?
Yes, yes, I think it's that way...
Oh there it is! Under the desk～

That's nice. Then please hurry up and pick it up and
stand up. Or else... your positioning. Um... it's
been, you see...
Awww, I can't reach it～
WHAT...?!

(She's squirming to try to reach for the needle, so
her hips are swaying back and forth in a suspicious
way...!)

(A-Amazing... Even her breasts are swaying back
and forth!)
Awww, nooo. It's so deep inside. I can't... do it...
(Whoa... She's starting to sound...!)
Ummmmm, Miss Nurse?
Yes? What is it?

Why don't you give up? I mean, you won't be able to
use a needle you dropped anyways. And at this rate,
um...
Huh? My, my...
Is my outfit too revealing?
N-No! I didn't see anything!
Very well.
Then let's end our shot session.
Phew... I was saved in so many different ways...
Then, what do you want to do next?
Huh...? Can't you just go home...?
No, I can't! I'm going to take care of you all day!
No, please. Just please go home!
*Giggle*... Then next, we can do bath time.
AHHH STOP! Don't take my clothes off. AAAAH!
(And the new nurse's care continued...)
